title: iPhone X + iPhone 8 Hands on!
description: Apple iPhone X Review & iPhone 8 vs 8 Plus hands on coming soon! iPhone X or Note 8?  The iPhone X packs a 5.8" OLED Display, A11 Bionic Processor, a Dual 12 megapixel camera with improved Portrait mode, Face ID, an wireless charging and more.   My Audio Setup & Gear:   Add me on Snapchat!  My Gear:  Instagram:  Twitter:
